extension.name: System - Incomplete Payment Registrations Notification
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: This plugin is used to notify administrator about incomplete payment registrations.

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin

field.name: notification_emails
field.label: Notification Emails
field.description: Enter emails you want to receive notification, comma separated. For example email1@domain.com,email2@domain.com. If you leave it empty, the notification emails in Configuration will be used

field.name: message
field.label: Message
field.description: Body Of The Email. You can use [IDS] and [LINKS] tag to show IDs of the registration record and links to these registration records

field.name: trigger_code
field.label: Trigger Code (Leave empty unless you are using cron job to trigger this plugin)
field.description: Enter a secret string here if you want to use cron job to trigger the notification. Refer to our documentation for more details
